main.name: Tatiana Rodr√≠guez
main.description: I love keeping learning new things all the time, so much so that now and for less than a year I have been programming with Reactjs giving very good results.
main.bio: Over the last year I have been learning and working in development and I have specialized in React js, because I think it is a surprising bookstore. For me it is very important to be learning something new every day, and I really hope it is noticed in each of the jobs I have done. On the other hand, I like editing videos and photography as a hobby.
main.contactmessage: Write me, so together we can see how I can be the piece that was missing from your team.

education.description: Thanks to Platzi I learned the basics of React, Redux, React Router and Next js and with that I was able to continue exploring for my part and start my own projects.

education.degree: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Projects
education.description: It was my first contact with javascript and there I knew what I wanted to do.
By doing this course I learned how important it is in usability issues to make responsive websites.
I have knowledge of administration, economics, marketing, logistics, international physical distribution, process optimization and financial statement analysis.

testimonials.text: Thanks to Tatiana I have the website that I dreamed of, and thanks to her execution my clients already have the complete information when they get in touch with me.
testimonials.user: Angela Machado - Las Palmas Hotel Owner

testimonials.text: Tatiana listened to the needs I had for my website and thanks to the ideas she expressed on the website we highlighted in the first fair that we participated
